itunes:title: Episode 085: Lila Cheney (feat. Margot Mutter)
title: Episode 085: Lila Cheney (feat. Margot Mutter)
itunes:author: Connor Goldsmith
description:
In Episode 85 of CEREBRO, Connor and tabletop game developer Margot Mutter STEAL THIS PLANET with the lively Lila Cheney! Created by Chris Claremont and Bob McLeod, punk rock superstar Lila was introduced as the unlikely love interest for Cannonball of the New Mutants, but became a reliable friend to the X-Men... when she isn't moonlighting as the galaxy's premier interstellar thief!

The CEREBRO character file on Lila Cheney begins at 1:11:08.

(Content Advisory: Lila's story includes slavery.)

Grateful to SkillShare for sponsoring the podcast this month. Visit skillshare.com/CEREBRO today to get your first month FREE! 



Advertising Inquiries: https://redcircle.com/brands
